datafield.subfield: Vitale, Dick. Getting a W in the game of life [ER], c2012:
title frame (Dick Vitale with Reji Laberje) p. 248 (Reji Laberje is a writer and speaker ; she lives near Milwaukee, Wisconsin)

(Reji Laberje writes juvenile fiction and has dabbled in playwriting, poetry, sports editorials, and Christian-inspired work for young children ; she worked in television in Chicago ; was an Arabic Linguist for the United States Air Force ; taught middle school outside of Washington, D.C. ; managed a bookstore in Southern Maryland ; has credits in International Communications and English from Community College of the Air Force, Defense Language Institute Foreign Language School, Howard Community College, University of Maryland University College, College of Southern Maryland, and UW Waukesha ; is part of the academic enrichment programming for Brookfield Academy)
Children's author and speaker Reji Laberje has worked in television, as a middle school teacher, and as an Arabic Linguist for the United States Air Force. She lives near Milwaukee, Wisconsin.
